author: holgerd77
content: Out of interest, are you guys setting explicit devnet goals? Are these written down somewhere? ðŸ¤”

author: barnabasbusa
content: finalization, and not missing any attestations from the validators for long period of time is pretty standard. This was a small devnet still, with not too many goals set out. One major test is spec compliance, and that was achieved among all clients. Now we can start focusing on devnet 6.

author: parithosh
content: We can start adding it to the devnet once they move beyond the interop phase. For now, we just launch devnets once the specs have been updated and it feels like the changes are breaking. The aim of most devnets is just to achieve finality and allow all clients to join in, sometimes we do basic fuzzing or small-scale tests. As we move closer to the fork we focus more on scenarios we want to test.

author: barnabasbusa
content: ~~Final warning for devnet 5 is being shut down in approx 5 mins!~~ Its now dead.
